content: the fin the number of sl to make together might vary the important thing is that you make the last sl in the same loop where you worked the 7th single_crochet flo small fin this part is worked in row r1 chain 5 4 r2 sl single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet make one additional sl in the loop where you sew the parts together made the last single_crochet flo before starting the chain 5 of the fin first sew the head to the body you must sew it to r6-bis of the body between the two big fins tail with the curvier part facing up this part is worked in row r1 chain 3 2 r2 sl single_crochet single_crochet flo in next stitch available of r5 of the body the stitch after the one where you made the last single_crochet blo before starting the chain 3 head then sew the shell to the body to do this sew this part is worked in rounds each of the stitches of r6-bis of the body to one r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 of the back loops left available at r6 of the shell r2 6 increase 12 for a good result pass the needle from the inside r3 2 single_crochet increase x 4 16 to the outside when passing it through the shell r4-r5 16 single_crochet 16 ​←​ these are 2 rounds loops and from the outside to the inside when r6 6 single_crochet decrease x 2 14 passing is through the body loops r7 5 single_crochet decrease x 2 12 @chiacrafts copyright once you ve sewed most of the body you can start stuffing it then sew the rest of the body while stuffing make a knot and hide the tail left inside the body enjoy the pattern heal t wait to see the result chiara - @chiacrafts copyright
